brief_summary.textblock:
This study aims to investigate the pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction of
      pyrimethamine and metformin IR after oral administration in healthy male volunteers.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Investigate the Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Drug-Drug Interaction of Pyrimethamine and Metformin IR

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy male subject aged 20 to 45 at screening A body weight in the range of 50 kg
             (inclusive)

          -  100 kg (inclusive) with ideal body weight range of +- 25% subjects who decide to
             participate voluntarily and write a informed consent form

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  subjects who have clinically significant disease of cardiovascular, respiratory,
             renal, endocrinological, hematological, gastrointestinal, neurological(central
             nervous system), psychiatric disorders or malignant tumor

          -  Subject judged not eligible for study participation by investigator.

clinical_study.official_title: A Open-label, Single Sequence Clinical Trial to Investigate the Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic Drug-drug Interaction of Pyrimethamine and Metformin IR After Oral Administration in Healthy Male Volunteers

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Clinical Pharmacology and Therapeutics, Seoul National University Bundang Hospital, Seoul, Korea

oversight_info.authority: Korea: Ministry for Health, Welfare and Family Affairs

primary_outcome.description: AUC(area under the plasma concentration-time curve), Cmax(maximum plasma concentration), t1/2
primary_outcome.measure: AUC(area under the plasma concentration-time curve)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: AUG (total area under the serum concentration-time curve for glucose) Gmax(maximum serum glucose concentration)
secondary_outcome.measure: AUG(total area under the serum concentration-time curve for glucose)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: predose and 15, 30, 45, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180min oral glucose tolerance test

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Pharmacokinetics/Dynamics Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
